https://tmrev.io/movie/97407-Apocalyptica: Live 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/si12Pq8uBQ8QSTcJzfxh4k1AF1o.jpg Live is the first official Apocalyptica DVD which consists of a recorded show in Munich, on the 24th of October, 2001. It only includes tracks from the first 3 albums: Plays Metallica by Four Cellos, Inquisition Symphony and Cult. Apocalyptica: Live
